characters.name: Mystrix
characters.slogan: Weapons are more trustworthy than people!
characters.description: An enigmatic woman from Rhine Advanced Military Academy's Espionage Division. Exuding an elegant yet lethal presence, this thorned rose weaves through darkness like a phantom, leaving nothing but gunsmoke and whispers in her wake.
